name: untangle-platform
description: Untangle Platform - Backend, Web, and Mobile

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:mobile
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:web && npm run typecheck:mobile
